steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
Navigate to PayM MBB page
I choose MBB PayM Random Device
Navigate to device details page
Land on the 'Tariffs and extra' page
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap DontCapMyBill Nill when BSC is Enabled
I Land on the basket page and choose home delivery option
click on "go to checkout" button

comments.value: #And input <Firstname> and <Surname> and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR

steps.name: input SL11ER  TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Not Select Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the payment page and verify copy text message below home address
land on the payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step'
Continue to Agreements page and confirm all the agreement checks
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 03_CFA_PAYM_MBB_MoreThanOneAddressMatching_PostCode_Then_Customer_Should_Select_One_From_DropdownList
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYM MBB' and lands on delivery page and
enters a postal code, if more than one address is matching corresponding to entered postcode then customer should be
able to select one from the dropdown list

steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
navigate to PAYM SIMO page
Select 'MBB' tab
Click on different 30 Days  Months Tariff in Tab
Select any Random Tariff in the displayed list of Tariffs under different 30 Days tab
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £60 when BSC is Enabled
I Land on the Plan included basket page and choose home delivery option
click on "go to checkout" button

comments.value: #And input <Firstname> and <Surname> and other valid details in Delivery page to verify GDPR

steps.name: input SL11ER  TEST and ACCEPTA and other valid details in Delivery page
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Not Select Not with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
land on the payment page and input TEST ACCEPTA and other details and click 'Continue on next step' for SimOnly
Continue to Review page and review the order
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 13_CFA_MBB_SIMO_MoreThanOneAddressMatching_PostCode_Then_Customer_Should_Select_One_From_DropdownList
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYM MBB SIMO' and lands on delivery page
and enters a postal code, if more than one address is matching corresponding to entered postcode then customer should
be able to select one from the dropdown list

steps.name: I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page
Signin using valid inavl0ww_555130@o2.com and test123 credentials
Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
Click on 'Get Started' CTA
Click on Tablet section in upgrade options page
Select a iPad 9.7 inch 2018 device from Recommended devices section
Click on device 'Confirm CTA'
Select a tariff
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £10 when BSC is Enabled
I should see 'Your Sim Card'section
no option should be selected
verify that Confirm CTA is not displayed
verify that copy text 'Your Sim Card'section
verfiy that two option are displayed
verify that 'Sim Swap Form'link is diplayed
I click on 'Sim Swap Form' I should be opned with a new tab
Select a 'I dont need a new sim'option
Verify that 'Confirm CTA' is displayed
Click on 'Confirm CTA'
Click on 'Continue' button on upgrade page at extra section
I Land on the basket page by clicking on Add to Basket button
verify that 'Go to checkout' CTA is enabled
Verify that the option selected by the user in 'Your sim card' section in upgrade options page is retained
click on "go to checkout" button
perform enterCode in OTAC page
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Not Not Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and Yes
Click on 'Use a different delivery address'link
enter  and  in Delivery section to set different delivery address

name: 15_CFU_PAYM_Tablets_Validate_Copy_HouseNumberOrNameOptional_And_Send_Blank_HouseNumber_And_PostalCode_In_DeliveryPage
description:
This Scenario ensures that when an upgrade  Customer selects 'PAYM Tablets' and lands on 'Payment page' and clicks on
'Use a different address link' for billing address then customer should see the copy 'House number or name (optional)'
instead of 'House number or name*' and having blank values for house number and postal code fields and clicks on 'Find
Address' CTA to search address then validation error should be present only for postal code field and not for house
number/name field  as its optional now

steps.name: I am an CFA user and Lands on shop page
navigate to PayG SIMO page
Select a pay as you go bundle
verify copy text You will need to give details for all fields marked with an asterisk is displayed in PAYG Sim Journey
verify asterisk is displayed against mandatory fields of "PAYG Free sim"
Enter delivery details  SL11ER in Delivery Page and info TEST and ACCEPTA for GDPR No
order confirmation is displayed

name: 20_CFA_PAYG_Free_SIM_MoreThanOneAddressMatching_PostCode_Then_Customer_Should_Select_One_From_DropdownList
description:
This Scenario ensures that when the Customer in acquisition journey selects 'PAYG Free SIM' and lands on delivery page
and enters a postal code, if more than one address is matching corresponding to entered postcode then customer should be able to select one from the dropdown list

steps.name: I am an Existing user and Navigates to Signin page
Signin using valid gby22862_163765@o2.com and test123 credentials
Navigate to upgrade > upgrade now
Click on 'Get Started' CTA
verify that the url has simo at the end
the 'Phones' button should be selected by default
click on the 'MBB' button
Click on 'Select' CTA to buy a tariff
copy text SIM delivery required or not is displayed
Validate consumer Bill Spend Caps section when BSC is Enabled
Choose your bill cap CapMyBill £100 when BSC is Enabled
Select 'I need a new sim' option
Click on 'Use a different delivery address'link
enter  and SL11ER in Delivery section to set different delivery address
Click on 'I agree to the terms and condition' checkbox in SIMO review page
Validate consumer GDPR consent section and choose Business preferences Select Not Select with No for Connected in delivery page when GDPR is Enabled and No
order confirmation is displayed
Validate consumer GDPR consent section is hidden in Order confirmation page or not

name: 24_CFU_MBB_SIMO_MoreThanOneAddressMatching_PostCode_Then_Customer_Should_Select_One_From_DropdownList
description:
This Scenario ensures that When a MBB Streamlined SIMO Upgrade(SSU)  customer lands on 'Review page' and opt for
'I need a new sim' option and then clicks on 'Use a different address link' for billing address and enters a postal
code, if more than one address is matching corresponding to entered postcode then customer should be able to select
one from the dropdown list
